item.title: Coffeescript allows `yes` and `no` or `on` and `off` as aliases for `true` and `false`
item.description: Documentation: https://coffeescript.org/#operators Discussion (where removing these aliases was proposed and rejected): https://github.com/jashkenas/coffeescript/issues/813
